title: Seagate Backup Plus USB3 Desktop Storage Drive Unboxing & First Look Linus Tech Tips
description:
CA: http://ncix.com/search/?categoryid=0&q=seagate+backup+plus
US: http://us.ncix.com/search/?categoryid=0&q=seagate+backup+plus

What if you wanted to back up more than just the data on your PC or Mac? What if you wanted to keep all of your pictures consolidated and safe in one place without worrying about managing them? Facebook backup is here with the Backup Plus from Seagate!
